full_threads.body:
Hi Madeleine, 

Great news we have the Quote Decline tag working! 

Here is a quick video run through: 
https://www.loom.com/share/9da75cb4d08b474e861b49eec9d34c7e

Please let me know if you need anything else?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @joel we have the go ahead for this one

Good Morning Heath,

Please let me know once you’ve done this. 😊

Kind Regards,

Madeleine Ryan

To: Madeleine Ryan <madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:madeleine@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Active Campaign Tag Needed

Hi Madeleine,

A client can’t actually ‘decline’ a quote. They used to be able to, but we have since removed that feature upon Dan’s request.

Hope that makes sense? Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR
